page.title: 17OAKWOOD SCHOOL WALSALL WOOD.
page.content: Oakwood Special School is situated in Druids Walk,Walsall Wood.It caters daily for about 42 mentally and physically handicapped children up to 16 years of age.They come from a 6 mile radius around Walsall Wood using the school's minibus,taxi or car. Oakwood is run by the Walsall Borough Council and has 30 staff including a speech therapist and a physiotherapist.Some of the children's physical needs are met by the use of a hydrotherapy pool and riding expeditions.The school has computers to help them read and develop spatial perception. Parents are always welcome at the school and they are actively involved in fund raising activities. Such money is used to cover the cost of providing the various amenities.
